Text: You know, its pretty annoying when you clog up this site with needless reposts of stuff people have already posted less than a week ago.

Excuse me, but this was just released minutes ago asshat.  Nobody on this site has posted this since it wasn't released.  You find me a link to a post of this comic scanned by theProletariat-Novus, and I'll stfu.  But until then stop being a bitch-ass troll.
the site isn't clogged up by novus scans. many times they are higher quality than previously posted versions, and often different resolutions. skip it and move on, don't complain.
